I am a second-year PhD student in statistics at UC Irvine. 
I previously received a B.S. in Mathematics-Computer Science at UC San Diego in 2019. In my spare time I love watching, playing, and reading about sports.

I can be reached at ewongtoi[at]uci[dot]edu.
